banner.subtitulo:
Get the best medical coverage
for you and your family.

seccionSalud.subtitulo: Discover the benefits of joining our clinic.

guardias.descripcion: Urgent medical attention all day long.

cobertura.descripcion: Network of centers across the country.

pediatria.descripcion: We take care of the little ones.

planes.subtitulo: Choose the plan that best suits you and your family. We offer comprehensive coverage, personalized care, and unique benefits to take care of your health.

plata.beneficio3: Access to lab and simple tests

horarios.respuesta: We are open Monday to Friday from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM, and Saturdays from 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM.

turno.pregunta: How do I schedule an appointment?
turno.respuesta: You can schedule an appointment through our website, by phone, or in person at reception.

obrasSociales.respuesta: Yes, we work with major health insurance providers and prepaid plans.

estudios.pregunta: Can I get tests done without an appointment?
estudios.respuesta: Some simple tests can be done without an appointment. Please consult beforehand.

reintegros.respuesta: Yes, depending on your medical coverage, you can request reimbursements with the corresponding invoice.

especialidades.pregunta: What medical specialties do you have?
especialidades.respuesta: We have over 20 specialties including general medicine, pediatrics, gynecology, cardiology, among others.

urgencias.respuesta: Yes, we have 24/7 emergency care at our main facility.

resultados.pregunta: How do I get my test results?
resultados.respuesta: You can view them on our web portal or pick them up in person with your ID.

pago.respuesta: Yes, we accept all payment methods: debit, credit, cash, and digital wallets.

reclamos.pregunta: Where can I file complaints or suggestions?
reclamos.respuesta: On our website in the 'Contact' section, or at reception at any location.

comentario1.texto: Excellent care, very humane and professional.

comentario2.texto: They always help me quickly and with a smile.

comentario3.texto: They helped me with the entire reimbursement process, very grateful.

comentario4.texto: The pediatrician was super kind to my daughter. 10 points.

comentario5.texto: Clean and modern facilities, I felt very comfortable.

comentario6.texto: I would come back without hesitation, very professional care.

comentario7.texto: They saw me on a Saturday without an appointment, excellent willingness.

comentario8.texto: Impeccable service, everything very well organized.

comentario9.texto: Thank you for your care and dedication!

comentario10.texto: Great human quality in all the staff.

comentario11.texto: The gynecologist was very clear and empathetic.

comentario13.texto: I would come back without a doubt. I felt cared for.

comentario14.texto: They solved a problem I had been dealing with for months.

comentario15.texto: The entire team was very attentive and professional.

comentario16.texto: The online results made everything easier.

comentario17.texto: Excellent treatment from reception to doctors.

comentario18.texto: Grateful for the care I received.

comentario19.texto: I felt at home, very good energy.

comentario20.texto: Fast, friendly and efficient. Everything you expect.

encuestasPage.subtitulo: Summary and analysis of patient satisfaction

tendencias.excelente: Excellent: Patients are highly satisfied with the services. The average rating reflects an exceptional experience.
tendencias.buena: Good: Most patients report positive experiences. There are opportunities for improvement to achieve excellence.
tendencias.regular: Fair: Results show moderate satisfaction. It is recommended to review negative comments to identify urgent areas for improvement.
tendencias.critica: Critical: Satisfaction levels are low. It is essential to analyze comments and take immediate corrective actions.
tendencias.rangoAlto: The overall rating indicates that patients would recommend the services.
tendencias.rangoMedio: The overall rating is neutral, suggesting there are aspects that require attention.
tendencias.rangoBajo: The overall rating is low, indicating significant dissatisfaction that requires intervention.

participacion.buenaDesc: More than half of the patients respond.

noHayEncuestas.descripcion: Patients will be able to complete surveys after their appointments.

paciente.info1: Remember to confirm your appointments 24 hours in advance
paciente.info2: You can cancel appointments up to 12 hours before
paciente.info3: Don't forget to complete the satisfaction surveys

especialista.info2: Complete the medical record for each consultation

entradaPage.necesitasAyudaDesc: Our team is available to assist you with any questions or concerns.

modal.descripcion: Select what you want to include in your medical history:

registerPage.tipoUsuario: What type of user are you?

errores.alMenosUnaEspecialidad: You must select at least one specialty or add a new one
errores.seleccionarImagenPerfil: You must select a profile image.
errores.seleccionarImagenFondo: You must select a background image.
errores.resolverCaptcha: You must solve the CAPTCHA correctly.
